Quick Overview

In a previous article, I talked about how to create a simple CRUD app with React and ROR. Now its time to implement user authentication and some other features.

Updates

  • User authentication
  • Add custom images
  • User Profile
  • UI changes

Built with

  • Ruby on Rails
  • Reactjs (context api, react hooks, react-router)
  • React-icons
  • ChakraUI
  • Formik

## Quick Overview
In a previous article, I talked about how to create a simple CRUD app with React and ROR. 
Now its time to implement user authentication and some other features.

# Updates
* User authentication
* Add custom images
* User Profile
* UI changes

# Built with
* Ruby on Rails
* Reactjs (context api, react hooks, react-router)
* React-icons
* ChakraUI
* Formik

**Live Demo:** [BlogApp](https://blog-frontend-react.herokuapp.com/)
**GitHub Repos:**
[reactFrontend](https://github.com/MA-Ahmad/blog-app-react-frontend) 
[backendApi](https://github.com/MA-Ahmad/blog-app-rails-backend)
